articles.title: Bitcoin Mining Difficulty Hits New Record High Following Network Upgrade
articles.description: Bitcoin's mining difficulty has reached an all-time high as the network continues to strengthen its security infrastructure.

articles.title: Marathon Digital Announces Major Expansion of Mining Operations in Texas
articles.description: Marathon Digital Holdings reveals plans to deploy 15,000 new ASIC miners across multiple facilities.

articles.title: Renewable Energy Powers 60% of Bitcoin Mining Operations, Study Shows
articles.description: New research indicates a significant shift toward sustainable energy sources in Bitcoin mining.
